<small>Aramaic form: [[H3790]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב‎</span><sub>223</sub> **verb** ==write== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כתב‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּתַב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כתב‎</span>, see especially [[BDB#Nö|Nö]] in [[BDB#Eut|Eut]]<sup>Nab. p. 43</sup>; thence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***book***, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex. 852</sup> (as loan-words, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>249</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ i (1887), 29</sup>); [[BDB#MV|MV]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw or sew together, conjoin*** (letters), etc., compare [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>ZMG 1873, 427</sup>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Josh.8.32|Josh 8:32]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַבְתָּ‎</span> [[Jer.36.6|Jer 36:6]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּכְתַבְתָּם‎</span> consecutive [[Deut.6.9|Deut 6:9]]; [[Deut.11.20|Deut 11:20]], etc. (Perfect 27 t.); ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְתֹּב‎</span> [[Isa.44.5|Isa 44:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּכְתֹּב‎</span> [[Exod.24.4|Exod 24:4]] +, etc. (Imperfect 39 t.); ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֹב‎</span> [[Isa.8.1|Isa 8:1]] + 5 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתָבֿ‎</span> [[Exod.34.27|Exod 34:27]] + 2 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְבָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְבֵם‎</span> [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]]; [[Prov.7.3|Prov 7:3]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתְבוּ‎</span> [[Deut.31.9|Deut 31:9]] + 3 t .; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתוֺכ‎</span> [[Jer.32.44|Jer 32:44]] ***cstr*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתוֺב‎</span> [[Ps.87.8|Ps 87:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִכְתֹּב‎</span> [[Deut.31.24|Deut 31:24]]; [[Josh.18.8|Josh 18:8]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְבוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.45.1|Jer 45:1]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּתֵב‎</span> [[Jer.36.18|Jer 36:18]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּתְבִים‎</span> [[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]]; [[Neh.10.1|Neh 10:1]] ***passive*** (113 t.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתוּב‎</span> [[Josh.1.8|Josh 1:8]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתוּבָה‎</span> [[2Sam.1.18|2Sam 1:18]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתוּבִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.7|1Kgs 15:7]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֻבִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.11.41|1Kgs 11:41]] +; feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתוּבוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.34.24|2Chr 34:24]] — 

**1.** ***write:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative, words [[Exod.34.27|Exod 34:27]], commandments [[Exod.24.12|Exod 24:12]], etc.; accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מכתב‎</span> [[Exod.39.30|Exod 39:30]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמִּכְתָּב‎</span> [[Deut.10.4|Deut 10:4]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּ‎</span>, giving purport of writing, also [[Esth.8.8|Esth 8:8]] but object also a book, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> [[Exod.32.32|Exod 32:32]]; [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגִלָּה‎</span> [[Jer.38.6|Jer 38:6]], compare participle pass, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִיא כְּתוּבָה פָּנִים וְאָחוֺר‎</span> [[Ezek.2.10|Ezek 2:10]] ( of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מגלה‎</span>; i.e. written on both sides); a letter, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפָר‎</span> [[2Sam.11.14|2Sam 11:14]]; [[2Kgs.10.1|2Kgs 10:1]] + 4 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִגֶּרֶת‎</span> [[2Chr.30.1|2Chr 30:1]] a divorce-certificate <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר כְּרִיתֻת‎</span> [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]], etc.; even <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֻחֹת כְּתֻבִים‎</span> ***tablets inscribed*** by the finger of God [[Exod.31.18|Exod 31:18]] compare [[Deut.9.10|Deut 9:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְּׁנֵי עֶבְרֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Exod.32.15|Exod 32:15]] ***tables inscribed on both sides*** (compare [[Ezek.2.10|Ezek 2:10]] above) Here belongs (probably) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְזֶה יִכְתֹּב יָדוֺ לי‎</span> [[Isa.44.5|Isa 44:5]] ***and this one shall*** ***inscribe his hand, 'Yahweh's'***, so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Kn|Kn]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Br|Br]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Di|Di]], [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]], ***shall sign*** (with) ***his hand unto*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** more often ***write*** something ***on***, or ***in*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> 85 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> 44 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> 3 t.) a tablet, roll, book, etc. (object various, as above): — (I) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> = ***book*** [[Deut.17.18|Deut 17:18]] + 55 t., especially in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כתובים עלסֿפר דברי וגו‎</span> [[1Kgs.11.41|1Kgs 11:41]] + often Kings Chronicles; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמְֿגִּלָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Jer.36.2|Jer 36:2]]; [[Jer.36.28|Jer 36:28]]; [[Jer.36.32|Jer 36:32]]; [[Jer.38.29|Jer 38:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַללֿוּח(ותׅ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]] + 7 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאֶֿבֶן‎</span> [[Deut.27.3|Deut 27:3]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלגּֿלָּיוֺן‎</span> [[Isa.8.1|Isa 8:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמְֿזֻזוֺת בַּיִת‎</span> [[Deut.6.9|Deut 6:9]]; [[Deut.11.20|Deut 11:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמַֿטֶּה‎</span> ***on a rod*** [[Num.17.17|Num 17:17]]; [[Num.17.18|Num 17:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעֵֿץ‎</span> [[Ezek.37.16|Ezek 37:16]] (twice in verse), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלצִֿיץ‎</span> (high priest's plate) [[Exod.39.30|Exod 39:30]] even (only Chronicles) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> followed by name of book or its contents: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלדִּֿבְרֵי נָתָן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[2Chr.9.29|2Chr 9:29]] compare [[2Chr.33.19|2Chr 33:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמִֿדְרַשׁ וגו‎</span> [[2Chr.24.27|2Chr 24:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿקִּינוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.35.25|2Chr 35:25]] figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַללִֿבָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Jer.31.83|Jer 31:83]] ***I will write them upon their heart***; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַללֿוּחַ לִבֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]]. (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> appears for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> only [[Jer.36.2|Jer 36:2]] compare [[Ezek.2.10|Ezek 2:10]]; [[Jer.51.60|Jer 51:60]]. (3) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספר‎</span> = ***book*** [[Josh.24.26|Josh 24:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 35 t.; = ***letter, bill, deed***, [[1Kgs.21.9|1Kgs 21:9]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּמְגִלַּת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר כָּתוּב עָלָ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.40.8|Ps 40:8]] ***it is prescribed to me***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> as [[2Kgs.22.13|2Kgs 22:13]] (**N.B.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> not used with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> = ***letter***, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> not used with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּחַ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אבן‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵץ‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** other uses of perp. with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> are: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחֶרֶט אֱנוֺשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Isa.8.1|Isa 8:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵט בַּרְזֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Jer.17.1|Jer 17:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֻבִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֶצְבַּע אֱלֹהִים‎</span> [[Deut.9.10|Deut 9:10]]; [[Exod.31.18|Exod 31:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> ***unto***, of person to whom letter, etc., is addressed [[2Sam.11.14|2Sam 11:14]]; [[2Kgs.10.6|2Kgs 10:6]]; [[Esth.9.13|Esth 9:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> substantive for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> (late) [[2Chr.30.1|2Chr 30:1]]; [[Ezra.4.7|Ezra 4:7]]; [[Esth.8.8|Esth 8:8]] the fuller construction is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספר וישׁלח (אֶלֿׅ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.1|2Kgs 10:1]]; [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]]; [[Esth.9.20|Esth 9:20]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> ***write down for*** the benefit or use of some one, [[Judg.8.14|Judg 8:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> ***to or for***, [[Deut.17.18|Deut 17:18]]; [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]] +; note especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶכְתָּו֯בלֿוֺ רֻבֵּו֯ תּוֺרָתִי‎</span> [[Hos.8.12|Hos 8:12]], i.e. either, ***I write (keep writing) for them ever so many*** ([[BDB#We|We]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹב‎</span>, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and most <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִבּוֺ(אׅ‎</span> a myriad) ***of my directions***, or ***'Though I write,' 'Were I to write,'*** etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> with infinitive of purpose [[2Chr.32.17|2Chr 32:17]]; [[Esth.8.5|Esth 8:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפִּי פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> ***write from the mouth of*** any one i.e. from dictation, [[Jer.36.2|Jer 36:2]]; [[Jer.36.32|Jer 36:32]]; [[Jer.38.6|Jer 38:6]]; [[Jer.38.17|Jer 38:17]]; [[Jer.38.27|Jer 38:27]]; [[Jer.45.1|Jer 45:1]]. 

**2.** = ***write down describe in writing***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Judg.18.4|Judg 18:4]]; [[Judg.18.6|Judg 18:6]]; [[Judg.18.8|Judg 18:8]] (3 t. in verse); [[Judg.18.9|Judg 18:9]]. 

**3.** = ***register enroll*** [[Isa.10.19|Isa 10:19]] (= record the number), [[1Chr.24.6|1Chr 24:6]] especially passive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְּתוּבִים‎</span> [[Num.11.26|Num 11:26]] ***those enrolled*** compare [[Neh.12.22|Neh 12:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשֵׁמוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכּ‎</span> [[1Chr.4.41|1Chr 4:41]] ***those recorded by name***; in prediction, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿאִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה עֲרִירִי‎</span> [[Jer.22.30|Jer 22:30]] ***register this man as childless***; with eschatological reference, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלהַֿכָּתוּב לַחַיִּים‎</span> [[Isa.4.3|Isa 4:3]] ***all those enrolled*** (i.e. appointed) ***unto life***; and, more explicitly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלהַֿנִּמְצָא כָּתוּב בַּסֵּפֶר‎</span> [[Dan.12.1|Dan 12:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְפֹּר בִּכְתוֺבּ עַמִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.87.6|Ps 87:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***shall reckon, when he registers*** (note absence of suffix) ***the*** ***peoples***, etc. 

**4.** = ***decree***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכְתֹּב עָלַי מְרֹרוֺת‎</span> [[Job.13.26|Job 13:26]] ***thou*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***decrest against me bitter things.*** **Niph\`al** (chiefly late, especially Esther), ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּתֵב‎</span> [[Esth.1.19|Esth 1:19]] +, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכָּ֫תֶב זֹאת‎</span> [[Ps.102.19|Ps 102:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּתֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Jer.17.13|Jer 17:13]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּֽתְבוּן‎</span> [[Job.19.23|Job 19:23]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְתָּב‎</span> [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***be written***, subject words [[Job.19.23|Job 19:23]], book [[Mal.3.16|Mal 3:16]] ***be written*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּסֵפֶר‎</span> [[Esth.2.23|Esth 2:23]]; [[Esth.9.23|Esth 9:23]], ***in, or among*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> the laws [[Esth.1.19|Esth 1:19]] once, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלסִֿפְרְךָ כֻּלָּם יִכָּתֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Ps.139.16|Ps 139:16]] ***in thy*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s ***book all of them*** (my members) ***are written***, i.e. ***written down, recorded*** (see below); absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתָב אֲשֶׁר נִכְתָּב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשֵׁם הַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> [[Esth.8.8|Esth 8:8]] ***a writing which is written in the king's name***, compare (impersonal) [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]] impersonal also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּכָּתֵב כְּכָלאֲֿשֶׁר צִוָּה‎</span> [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]]; [[Esth.8.9|Esth 8:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּ‎</span> followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> = ***for*** [[Ps.102.19|Ps 102:19]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> + infinitive (really = a subject-cl., — the contents of the letter) [[Esth.3.9|Esth 3:9]]; [[Esth.8.5|Esth 8:5]]. 

**2.** ***be written down, recorded***, [[Ezra.8.34|Ezra 8:34]] ***enrolled***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּכְתָב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בית ישׂראל לֹא יִכָּתֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.13.9|Ezek 13:9]] ***in the enrolement of the house of Israel they are not enrolled*** (eschatolog.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעִםצַֿדִּיקִים אַליִֿכָּתֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Ps.69.29|Ps 69:29]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיִּים יִמָּחוּ מִסֵּפֶר‎</span>) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאָרֶץ יִכָּתֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Jer.17.13|Jer 17:13]] is difficult; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] reads, plausibly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֶרֶץ יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ‎</span> (compare [[Ps.34.17|Ps 34:17]]; [[Ps.101.8|Ps 101:8]], etc.) **Pi\`el** frequently, ***Perfect*** and ***Participle***, only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתֵּ֑בוּוּמְכַתְּבִים עָמָל‎</span> [[Isa.10.1|Isa 10:1]] and ***busy writers that make a business of writing*** oppression (i.e. register unjust sentences, compare **Qal 4**; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחֹקֲקִים חִקֲקֵיאָֿוֶן‎</span>).
